title: Autonauts
description:
Travel the universe colonising uninhabited planets with the sole goal of setting worlds in motion through the power of automation. Fresh from your spaceship you must harvest stick and stone and begin your colonisation efforts. Assassin’s Creed Rogue
Create rudimentary crafting items from blueprints and slowly build a number of workerbots to aid in your efforts. Teach and shape their artificial intelligence with a visual programming language, then instruct them to begin the formation of your colony .
arvel as a planet you’ve shaped becomes home to a civilisation of workerbots, happy to do your bidding Expand further with the creation of colonists ; beings that require your assistance to survive. Push your workerbots further by introducing fishing, cooking, housing, and tailoring and help the colonists into a state of transcendence.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K (4 * 3500) or equivalent/AMD FX-9370 (8 * 4400) or equivalent
system_requirements.Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 (2048 MB) or Radeon HD 7870 (2048 MB)
